original: intros m z i H_inv H_exd. pose (p := Iter_upb m z). destruct (ex_i_upb m z H_inv H_exd) as [j [Hj1 Hj2]]. exists j. split. - apply Iter_period with (n := 1%nat) in H_inv; try auto. simpl in H_inv. rewrite Nat.add_0_r in H_inv. apply eq_sym in H_inv. rewrite <- H_inv. auto. - auto.
